attributes.title: Not What I Had In Mind

I donâ€™t appreciate how this app can track my location when using it. Is that even legal? Another thing, my battery percentage is going down faster than when I use other apps. I donâ€™t know why for I donâ€™t use the app for a long time. Iâ€™m not sure if the developers of this app thought about certain aspects of this app. I wish there was more. I was hoping to see other candidates represented on this app, but itâ€™s all Donald Trump. Iâ€™m sorry but Iâ€™m going to have to delete this app. Iâ€™ll go to CNN for my election polls and news. Maybe Fox. You guys need to update the app, take it down, or redesign various aspects of this app. By the way, I donâ€™t understand why America voted for a Cheeto puff as our president. Maybe because thereâ€™s no faith in the government anymore where we, the people, have to resort to using food as our leader. To be quite honest, if we had a better government and president then this country will be more happy. Too many things have gone on here in America that need to be addressed. Has our president addressed them? Not correctly. A president is a leader. Someone who people can follow. Maybe some do, but are you serious. â€œIllegal immigrantsâ€ are not the problem. The government is the problem. How you mandate things is the problem. I donâ€™t want you to â€œmake America great againâ€ it should have already been great to begin with and Donald Trump hasnâ€™t done anything.
